title: Holding Tight (New Adult Biker Gang Romance)
description: She's back home after her kidnapping, but she doesn't know how she can return to high school and a normal life after what she's been through.Megan can't resist Merle, can't manage to leave him alone - but when they step into another volotile situation, whose word do they take? How can Megan learn who to trust?
author: Sarah Sorana
